name: GoTo Meeting
description: Integrate with GoTo Meeting to list, create, get and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Meetings
tools.description: List upcoming and past GoTo Meetings. Filter by date range and whether to include historical meetings.

tools.name: Create Meeting
tools.description: Create a new GoTo Meeting. Specify subject, start and end times, and optional password.

tools.name: Get Meeting
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific GoTo Meeting by its meeting ID.

tools.name: Delete Meeting
tools.description: Delete (cancel) a scheduled GoTo Meeting by its meeting ID. This action cannot be undone.
